data.title: Homepage
data.meta_description: Information on real estate, employers, and talent to guide your relocation and business expansion decision in Southern Dallas County.
data.meta_site_name: Southern Dallas County Economic Development Guide
data.text: Southern Dallas County, part of an over 3 million strong regional labor force, is robust and diverse. Companies can easily draw from a deep base of skilled workers, from entry level to the C-suite. Over 1 million people with a median household income of over $51,000 call Southern Dallas County home. There are 5 colleges and universities there that serve as a training ground for your future workforce. Access is easy with multiple interstate highways (I-35, I-45, I-20 and future Loop 9), 13 light rail stops, and 4 general aviation airports within minutes from downtown Dallas. Itâ€™s no wonder why so many companies are choosing Southern Dallas County as their base to serve the entire North American continent.
